description: Inside the LRLIBRARY file, photos are stored in the originals folder and organized by the date they were captured. This structure helps Lightroom quickly locate and display imported images. The LRLIBRARY file also contains supporting data, such as .MCAT catalog files and other metadata files, which Lightroom uses to track edits, tags, albums, and other organizational details.

You can change the storage location of LRLIBRARY files by selecting Preferences → Local Storage or Cache in Lightroom.
